-e ---

Ugaritic letter 𐎄 enigmatic

Proposed secondary reading:

𐎄 DelTar vs 𐎏𐎘 DHAL/THA
𐎄 DRIT > DLT / Talath 3 Three Tür 𓉐 door 𐎄𐎍𐎚 “dlt”
𐎄 BRD BLD < PRT 𓉐 port
𐎄 BRT > 𐎁 BETA 𓉔 beith

Vocabulary
𐎄𐎍𐎚/𐎏𐎍𐎚 PORT/DOOR(Tür/door)
𐎄𐎍𐎚/𐎏𐎍𐎚 poor/dull (adj.)
𐎄 1. bird 2. Tier 𓅂 (bird)
𐎄𐎏𐎎 bloodma > adam

peculiar bivalence

𐎂𐎄 قَسْبُور qasbūra 𒊺𒇽 kisibirru coriander 𐎂𐎄 גּׅידא giḏā 𒊺𒇽 korijadana 𐀒𐀪𐀊𐀅𐀙 ko-ri-ja-da-na coriander

𐎖𐎄𐎌 #qdš קדוש kadósh مُقَدَّس muqaddas "sacred" vs
𐎖𐎄𐎌 •qbrš aqbarš 𒀝𒉿;𒀝𒉿𒅁 ak-pi; ak-pi-ip holy, sacred ⇔ Allahu Akbar (mighty)
